thread.section_title: Stellenbosch Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A most satisfactory and happy experience
thread.title_full: A most satisfactory and happy experience - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: sallybU1848TD
title: A most satisfactory and happy experience
text: A great mid town situation, a most attractive hotel with very friendly and extremely helpful staff . The hotel serves as a good central point for exploring the area and it is a most relaxing place to stay. I can't wait to return!
